com.flir.flironesdk

Class RenderedImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flir.flironesdk.RenderedImage

  • public class RenderedImage
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a rendered image created from a Frame from the device.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RenderedImage.ImageType
      Contains all supported frame output formats
      static class  RenderedImage.Palette
      A colorized frame's palette Will be null for non-applicable frame types

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float emissivity()
      Emissivity relates to how reflective a material is.
      Frame getFrame()
      Returns the original Frame object that this rendered image was created from.
      int height() 
      RenderedImage.ImageType imageType()
      Gets the type of frame
      RenderedImage.Palette palette()
      Gets the palette used to colorize the thermal image for applicable frame types
      byte[] pixelData()
      Gets the raw pixel data as a byte array.
      int width() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getFrame

        public Frame getFrame()
        Returns the original Frame object that this rendered image was created from.
        Returns:
        The raw Frame object.

      • imageType

        public RenderedImage.ImageType imageType()
        Gets the type of frame
        Returns:
        The format of the image
        See Also:
        RenderedImage.ImageType

      • palette

        public RenderedImage.Palette palette()
        Gets the palette used to colorize the thermal image for applicable frame types
        Returns:
        Palette used for colorized image, or null for a non-colorized image

      • emissivity

        public float emissivity()
        Emissivity relates to how reflective a material is.
        Returns:
        The emissivity setting, affects temperature readings only.

      • width

      • height

        public int height()

      • pixelData

        public byte[] pixelData()
        Gets the raw pixel data as a byte array. Check the frame type for the format of the data.
        Returns:
        Raw pixel data.
